name: Hospitalized
description:
"Hospitalized" is a game made in Bitsy, meant to show some of the experiences of being in a psychiatric hospital. The game is focused on it's narration and world building, where you "go through the motions" of the day while interacting with nurses, therapists, and other patients. With a simplistic design, the game is meant to replicate the feelings of dullness that come with a stay at a psych hospital, and provide insight to players, which, in turn, reduces stigma.

Due to hospitals having different experiences for different people, this game may not reflect yours or your loved one's experience perfectly.
